meanings.sent1: Her engrained beliefs guided her actions.
meanings.sent2: The engrained traditions of the community were passed down for generations.
meanings.sent3: The engrained habit of checking her phone constantly made her friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: His engrained loyalty to his team was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The engrained sense of duty drove him to always help others.

meanings.sent1: The engrained fear of spiders made her scream at the sight of one.
meanings.sent2: His engrained love for nature led him to protect the environment.
meanings.sent3: The engrained dislike for broccoli made her avoid it at all costs.
meanings.sent4: The engrained memories of childhood brought a smile to her face.
meanings.sent5: The engrained sense of pride in her heritage was evident in everything she did.
